about_the_game:
The Hangover: Dwarven Edition

Woke up with a memory gap the size of a giant's mug? Meet Olaf, a dwarf whose legendary night out has left him with a hangover of epic proportions... and a whole lot of explaining to do.

In this hilarious pixel art puzzle adventure, you'll rewind time to help Olaf piece together the chaotic events of the previous night and fix the mayhem he caused. A vital item is missing, the local tavern is in ruins, a haunted lumber mill looms in the distance...

Key Features:

  • Reverse the Timeline: Each step is a step into the past. Navigate backwards through Olaf's drunken escapades, solving puzzles as objects repair and actions rewind.

  • From Rampage to Repair: Clean up the aftermath of Olaf's epic pub crawl. Rebuild the tavern, fix what's broken, and try to avoid further embarrassment.

  • Fantasy with a Hangover: Explore a quirky fantasy world where dwarves suffer legendary hangovers, ghosts haunt lumber mills, and the consequences of a wild night are more than just a headache.

  • Charming Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted pixel art world that perfectly captures the humor and mystery of Olaf's predicament.

Experience a hilarious blend of "The Hangover", sokoban and classic point-and-click adventures in this compact 2-hour romp through the morning after an epic dwarven pub crawl.

Warning: Contains questionable decisions, ale-induced amnesia, and a whole lot of dwarven shenanigans.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains groans, vomiting and consuming alcohol. You can disable it by switching from the Beer to the Ginger Ale mode.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i3 7100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Olaf the Boozer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 7100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: You wake up with a hangover, a trashed tavern, and a furious barkeep. Who's to blame? Spoiler: everyone, but especially you. Solve sokoban puzzles, dive into a medieval party vibe, and experience that post-hangover "what happened?" feeling.
